Regular.description:
Use on light mode surfaces to ensure UI is AA compliant  .

--------------------------------

Approved light mode surfaces: 
Primary - White 
Secondary - Gray 100

Subtle.description:
Use on light mode surfaces to ensure UI is AA compliant  .

--------------------------------

Approved light mode surfaces: 
Primary - White 
Secondary - Gray 100

Disabled.description:
Use on light mode to ensure UI is AA compliant  .

Disabled and Placeholder text are considered exemptions for AA compliance. However, Aria best practice should be implemented on the frontend to support screen readers.

--------------------------------

Approved light mode surfaces: 
Primary - White 
Secondary - Gray 100

Primary - White.description: Use with light mode text color styles.

Secondary - Gray 100.description: Use with light mode text color styles.

Primary - Gray 800.description: Use with dark mode text color styles.

Secondary - Gray 900.description: Use with dark mode text color styles.

Tertiary - Gray 1000.description: Use with dark mode text color styles.

Overlay - 55%.description: Use for modals on light and dark themes.

Overlay - 65%.description: Use for modals on light and dark themes.

Overlay - 75%.description: Use for modals on light and dark themes.

Overlay - 85%.description: Use for modals on light and dark themes.

Blue 700- Teal 600.description:
Use dark mode BEAM text color style ‘Regular’ on AA compliment surface gradients to insure designs are always AA compliant.

Be sure to manually check any other text color used on surface gradients using the Stark plugin.

Teal 700 - Teal 600.description:
Use dark mode BEAM text color style ‘Regular’ on AA compliment surface gradients to insure designs are always AA compliant.

Be sure to manually check any other text color used on surface gradients using the Stark plugin.

Gray 900 - Gray 600.description:
Use dark mode BEAM text color style ‘Regular’ on AA compliment surface gradients to insure designs are always AA compliant.

Be sure to manually check any other text color used on surface gradients using the Stark plugin.

Teal 600 - Green 300.description:
Accent Gradients should be used for header, footer, or container decoration only.

Do not use these gradients with text. They will not pass AA.

Blue 700 - Teal 500.description:
Accent Gradients should be used for header, footer, or container decoration only.

Do not use these gradients with text. They will not pass AA.

Blue 600 - Teal 400.description:
Accent Gradients should be used for header, footer, or container decoration only.

Do not use these gradients with text. They will not pass AA.

Shadow 1.description:
Use shadows in service of the customer experience, not for visual decoration.

For example, shadows may be used to create hierarchy on a page. It’s ok to use shadows on repeat patterns that have a flat hierarchy. (Example: Plan grid)

HEADER CAPS LARGE - 16px.description: Use HEADER CAP styles as a decorative headers/labels. Should not exceed more than 3-4 words. Do not use as multi-line text.

HEADER CAPS MEDIUM - 14px.description: Use HEADER CAP styles as a decorative headers/labels. Should not exceed more than 3-4 words. Do not use as multi-line text.

HEADER CAPS SMALL - 12px.description: Use HEADER CAP styles as a decorative headers/labels. Should not exceed more than 3-4 words. Do not use as multi-line text.

Regular - 14px.description: 12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.

Italic - 14px.description: 12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.

Regular - 12px.description: 12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.

Italic - 12px.description: 12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.

Label Large - 18px.description: Use for form labels, buttons, active navigation, and active tabs. Do not use for multi-line text.

Label Medium - 16px.description: Use for form labels, buttons, active navigation, and active tabs. Do not use for multi-line text.

Label Small - 14px.description: Use for form labels, buttons, active navigation, and active tabs. Do not use for multi-line text.

Link Large - 18px.description:
There are two color variations available for links. Use Color Styles / Text:

--------------------------------

All links should be sentence case unless they contain a proper noun.

Link Medium - 16px.description:
There are two color variations available for links. Use Color Styles / Text:

--------------------------------

All links should be sentence case unless they contain a proper noun.

Link Small - 14px.description:
There are two color variations available for links. Use Color Styles / Text:

--------------------------------

All links should be sentence case unless they contain a proper noun.

12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.

Link Tiny - 12px.description:
There are two color variations available for links. Use Color Styles / Text:

--------------------------------

All links should be sentence case unless they contain a proper noun.

12px and 14px Regular do pass AA size/weight requirements and can be used for items such as legal copy, tool tips, breadcrumbs, as well as other components that have high-density needs.
